data.text: #AI500 .... performance. I hope you all enjoy this stroll down the best of the best. To tell you just how good these 500 are...the lowest one is rated at 70/100. Idol gave us some amazing moments. These are the 500 best!!

#AI500 ..... only the highest rated one will be counted. I am using the hashtag AI500 for Top 500 American Idol performances. I will tag the Idol that sang the song when able to. I will list the rating https://t.co/9eV3QLkiob gave each performance, and then present the...

#AI500 .... so will present a reprise in it's place. I am using the ratings from https://t.co/9eV3QLkiob who have rated every performance on a scale of 0-100. A lot of these are tied at a certain rating, so I decided how to rank them. If a song was reprised on the show, than....
